fields.label: Spreadsheet ID
fields.description: Copy the ID from your Google Sheets URL (the part between /d/ and /edit). Example: 1A2B3C4D5E6F7G8H9I0J

fields.label: Sheet Name
fields.description: Name of the tab inside the spreadsheet (e.g., Sheet1, Data, etc.)

fields.label: Range to Update
fields.description: Specify the range to update (e.g., A1:D5, B2:C10). Leave empty to update entire sheet.

fields.label: Data to Update
fields.description: Enter the data to update. For single cell: 'value'. For multiple cells: JSON array like [['row1col1', 'row1col2'], ['row2col1', 'row2col2']]

fields.label: Confirm Update
fields.description: Check this box to confirm that you want to update the specified data. This will overwrite existing data.
